entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 then becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
